servinfo.title: DTC Clearance
servinfo.ptxt: After repair or replace of malfunction part(s), clear all DTCs by performing the following procedure.

s1.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool to data link connector in the same manner as when making this connection for DTC check.
Turn ignition switch ON and engine stops.
Erase DTC according to instructions displayed on scan tool. Refer to scan tool operator’s manual for further details.
After completing the clearance, turn ignition switch off and disconnect scan tool from data link connector.
Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Perform following Steps a) to d) within 10 seconds after ignition switch is turned ON and engine stops.

s2.ptxt: Repeat Steps a) and b) 3 times.
Press and release driver side door switch 4 times.

s1.ptxt: After completing above Steps, confirm that no malfunction DTC is detected.
